title: Atoms, Ions, and Isotopes
body: On the exoplanet Kepler-186f, a newly discovered element, Keplerium (Kp), has three stable isotopes. Their natural abundances and atomic masses have been determined to be: Keplerium-212: Atomic mass $$=$$ $$211.93$$ u, Natural abundance $$=$$ $$58.72\%$$, Keplerium-215: Atomic mass $$=$$ $$214.91$$ u, Natural abundance $$=$$ $$28.35\%$$, Keplerium-218: Atomic mass $$=$$ $$217.88$$ u, Natural abundance $$=$$ $$12.93\%$$.
